title: UDM Theatre Company and Ringwald Theatre announce a new artistic collaboration with "The Whale" (University ...
text: ( Source : University of Detroit Mercy ) The UDM Theatre Company and the Ringwald Theatre announce their first artistic collaboration with their season opening production of The Whale . Performed at The Ringwald Theatre in Ferndale , Mich. ,
